org.apache.juneau.http

Class SerializedHttpEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.entity.AbstractHttpEntity
      • org.apache.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity
        • org.apache.juneau.http.BasicHttpEntity
          • org.apache.juneau.http.SerializedHttpEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpEntity

    public class SerializedHttpEntity
extends BasicHttpEntity
    HttpEntity for serializing POJOs as the body of HTTP requests.

      • schema

        public SerializedHttpEntity schema(HttpPartSchema value)
        Sets the schema to use to serialize the content.

        Value is ignored if the serializer is not schema-aware.

        Parameters:
        value - The schema.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • chunked

        public SerializedHttpEntity chunked()
        Description copied from class: BasicHttpEntity
        Shortcut for calling AbstractHttpEntity.setChunked(boolean) with true.
        • If the BasicHttpEntity.getContentLength() method returns a negative value, the HttpClient code will always use chunked encoding.
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
